main event: Several bright circular objects emitting bluish-white light were sighted by trained personnel of the Illinois National Guard during routine night maneuvers.
interesting points: The objects were observed for approximately 12 minutes,The objects were estimated to be 5 miles from the observers,The objects traveled at high speed in a straight line and could reverse their direction,The speed of the objects greatly exceeded that of any known aerial vehicle,The incident is under investigation and further details will be provided as they become available.
sighted object: bright circular objects emitting bluish-white light
witness description: trained personnel of the Illinois National Guard
